name: Integration for Keap/infusionsoft and Contact Form 7, WPForms, Elementor, Formidable, Ninja Forms
author: CRM Perks

sections.description:
Contact Form 7 Keap/infusionsoft Plugin sends form submissions from Contact Form 7, WPforms, Elementor Forms, Ninja Forms, Formidable Forms, Contact Form Entries and many other popular contact form plugins to Infusionsoft/Keap CRM when anyone submits a form. Learn more at crmperks.com

Contact Form 7 Keap/Infusionsoft Setup

  • Go to “infusionsoft Accounts” tab and add new account then connect your Keap/infusionsoft account.
  • Go to “infusionsoft Feeds” tab then add new feed.
  • Map required infusionsoft fields to Contact form 7 form fields.
  • Send your test entry to infusionsoft crm.
  • Go to “Infusionsoft Logs” tab and verify, if entry was sent to Keap/Infusionsoft.

Connect infusionsoft account

Connect any contact form 7 form to infusionsoft/Keap by safe and secure Oauth 2.0. Additionally, You can connect multiple Keap/Infusionsoft accounts.

Map infusionsoft fields

Map any contact form 7 form fields to infusionsoft/Keap object(Contacts, Company, Tasks, Order) fields. Also, You can map unlimited Keap/infusionsoft object fields to contact form 7 form fields.

Filter contact form 7 submissions

Easily filter contact form 7 entries sent to infusionsoft/Keap based on user input. For example , only send contact form entry to infusionsoft which contanins work email address.

Manually send entry to infusionsoft

Send contact form 7 entries to infusionsoft when anyone submits a form. Later You can manually send contact form 7 entries to infusionsoft.

infusionsoft logs

View a detailed log of each contact form 7 entry whether sent or not sent to infusionsoft and easily resend contact form 7 entry to infusionsoft CRM.

Send Data As infusionsoft object Notes

Send one to many contact form 7 fields as infusionsoft Contact notes.

Create Or Update Contact in Infusionsoft

If a contact already exists in infusionsoft CRM, update it otherwise create a new contact.

Why we built this plugin

Contact Form 7 and some other popular contact forms are good but you can not send contact form submissions to any crm including infusionsoft. You can send to any contact form(contact form 7) submissions to infusionsoft with this free plugin.

Premium Version Features.

Following features are available in Pro version only Contact Form Infusionsoft Pro.

  • Infusionsoft Custom fields.
  • Phone Number fields of Infusionsoft Contact.
  • Assign Tags to Infusionsoft Contacts based on user input.
  • Infusionsoft Contact Attachments and affiliates tracking.
  • Google Analytics Parameters and Geolocation of a visitor who submitted the form.
  • Lookup lead’s email and phone number using email and phone lookup apis.
  • 20+ premium addons

Want to send data to crm

We have Premium Extensions for 20+ CRMs.View All CRM Extensions

Need Infusionsoft/Keap Plugin for Woocommerce ?

We have Infusionsoft add-on for Woocommerce. Woocommerce Infusionsoft Plugin

Our free Infusionsoft/Keap Plugins

  • Gravity Forms Keap/Infusionsoft
  • Keap/Infusionsoft WooCommerce Plugin
sections.faq:
Where can I get support?

Our team provides free support at https://www.crmperks.com/contact-us/.

Contact Form 7 Keap/infusionsoft Integration

Easily integrate contact form 7 form to infusionsoft/Keap crm by simply connecting your infusionsoft/Keap account to then select any object and map contact form 7 fields to infusionsoft/Keap fields.

WPForms infusionsoft

  • Easily connect WPforms to your Keap/infusionsoft account.
  • Create feeds for Keap Contacts, Companies etc.
  • New WPforms submission will be automatically sent to your Keap account.

Elementor forms Keap

  • Easily Connect Elementor forms to your Keap account.
  • Create a feed for any object, select correct Elementor form and finally map fields in feed.
  • When someone submits Elementor form, submission will be automatically sent to your Keap account.
  • You can manually send any Elementor forms entry to Keap by clicking “send to Keap” button.

Contact form 7 Keap/infusionsoft add on

With Contact form 7 Keap/infusionsoft addon, You can easily create a contact/company or Invoice in infusionsoft/Keap When anyone submits a contact form on your site.

Ninja Forms infusionsoft

  • Easily connect Ninja Forms to your Keap account.
  • After connecting Keap account, create a feed for Contacts, Companies and Tickets etc.
  • New Ninja Forms submission will be automatically sent to your Keap account.
  • You can manually send any Ninja Forms entry to Keap by clicking “send to Keap” button.

Formidable Forms Keap

  • Connect your Keap account with our plugin.
  • Create feeds for any Keap object like Contacts, Companies etc. Select correct Formidable Form in feed.
  • New Formidable Form submission will be automatically sent to your Keap account.
  • You can manually send any Formidable Form entry to Keap by clicking “send to Keap” button.
sections.changelog:
1.1.9

  • fixed tags issue in feed.

1.1.8

  • added elementor, wpforms and ninja forms.

1.1.7

  • fixed “product fatal error” issue.

1.1.6

  • fixed “escape variables” issue.

1.1.5

  • fixed “empty search response” issue.

1.1.4

  • fixed “add field” button not working issue.

1.1.3

  • fixed developer app issue.
  • fixed “debug xss” issue.

1.1.2

  • fixed php8 issues.

1.1.1

  • fixed file field warning.

1.1.0

  • fixed affiliate Order field.
  • fixed contact form 7 dropdown field.

1.0.9

  • fixed user_id issue for Note.
  • fixed invalid url issue.

1.0.8

  • fixed “CompanyName” field as primary key in “Company” object.
  • fixed “select app type selectbox”.

1.0.7

  • added owner_id field.
  • added custom app option.

1.0.6

  • append notes to person notes field instead of notes list.

1.0.5

  • fixed PhoneType error.

1.0.4

  • fixed tags filter.
  • fixed search fields of infusionsoft.
  • added support for Order payment.

1.0.3

  • fixed xml parsing error for lead sources.
  • fixed “updating a company is not working”.
  • fixed owner assignment.
  • fixed wrong data format.

1.0.2

  • added new feature “Connect one infusionsoft account to multiple sites”.

1.0.1

  • Fixed infusionsoft phone number.

1.0.0

  • Initial release.
sections.screenshots:
1. Connect Infusionsoft Account.

  2. Map Infusionsoft fields to contact form 7 form fields.

  3. Infusionsoft logs.

  4. Send Contact form 7 entry to Infusionsoft using free Contact Form Entries Plugin.

  5. Get Customer's email infomation from Full Contact(Premium feature).

  6. Get Customer's geolocation, browser and OS (Premium feature).
sections.reviews:
Does exactly what I needed

By kenel on March 11, 2024

From Contact Form to Kaep, works as advertised.

Saved my life!

By icontreas on February 15, 2022

Having Infusionsoft as a CRM this plugin literally saved my life! Best solution to upgrade our marketing

Perfect Solution for Keap Integration

By oceanonedesign on January 26, 2021

I was in a bind because I have a client that uses Keap but they need multiple languages. The forms that you build in Keap can only be in one language so we needed a form that we could do multiple languages and synchronize with Infusionsoft (Keap). I use Contact Form 7 all the time so thankfully, I found this awesome Contact Form 7 Infusionsoft plugin that takes care of the Keap Integration. It was pretty straight ahead to set up but there was something that was preventing it from updating the Keap database. I reached out to the team that developed this plugin and they got right back to me, asked for a screenshot of my settings and got back to me with a simple setting change that instantly resolved it. I highly recommend this to anyone who needs to get Contact Form 7 and Infusionsoft to work together.

Works perfectly

By websitelifestyle on October 20, 2020

This plugin is super light-weight and works as expected. I was able to get the integration with KEAP setup with ease and have had zero issues. Support is very responsive and helpful, they even followed up after they had previously helped me with a question to see how things were going! Highly recommend!

A simple solution for Infusionsoft or Keap users

By slohn on May 9, 2019

I was so relieved to see that someone finally developed an easy way to get Contact Form 7 data into Infusionsoft! We had been using Zapier, but had to pay quite a bit to access the functionality we needed. CRM Perks was the cheap and easy way to get our data where it needed to go. And whenever I had any problems or questions, the support team at CRM Perks were responsive and diligent to resolve any issues. 100% would recommend! Bonus: their conditional user assignment plugin addition fixed Infusionsoft's big problem of not being able to assign an account owner based on Zip Code! Invaluable!

Awesome Extension!!!

By mesmiranda918 on March 27, 2019

Great extension, amazing support! ^_^
